channel.title: Comments on: Your NPC Trainer is Where?

item.title: By: Zhaneel
item.dc:creator: Zhaneel
item.description: Blizz hates enchanters. Have since alpha. Blech. Most expensive, least profitable, useless skill they've implemented.
item.content:encoded: Blizz hates enchanters. Have since alpha. Blech. Most expensive, least profitable, useless skill they’ve implemented.

item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description: We found that out later by looking at a map of the zone ... hadn't tried that backdoor yet tho. Thanks for the heads up.
item.content:encoded: We found that out later by looking at a map of the zone … hadn’t tried that backdoor yet tho. Thanks for the heads up.

item.title: By: Occam
item.dc:creator: Occam
item.description: You know there is a backdoor into Uldaman, right? Its the cave you can see on the badlands map, a bit northwest of the dragonscale leatherworker. Just a few troggs guarding it. It puts you just a bit away from the enchanter trainer. Saves you hours and hours and hours of time and hassle.
item.content:encoded: You know there is a backdoor into Uldaman, right? Its the cave you can see on the badlands map, a bit northwest of the dragonscale leatherworker. Just a few troggs guarding it. It puts you just a bit away from the enchanter trainer. Saves you hours and hours and hours of time and hassle.
